reviewDetails.comment: Dr Joe is pleasant, thorough, and willing to answer all questions. He discusses options and makes recommendations but will work with your schedule. The office is efficient and rarely runs more than 5 mins late, and is sometimes early.

I would recommend Dr. Joe for any parent searching for a pediatric dermatologist. He answered all our questions throughly and has a good “bedside manner”.  His office hours worked really well for us given our hectic family schedules. We did not have to wait for weeks to schedule an appointment.
I would strongly recommend Dr. Edwin Joe as a dermatologist.
He was patient and thourough

reviewDetails.comment: Seemed like he was in a rush, didn’t give helpful advice. Overpriced

I did not have the best visits with Dr. Arnouk. He lacks empathy and seemed impatient. I said to him, "I hope I don't need knee surgery." He just totally ignored me instead of saying something. I just don't feel confident my health is in his best interest. I will not be going there anymore.
Professional, efficient, great office overall.
Very friendly and knowledgeable. The entire staff was also nice. They make you feel at ease.
Dr Arnouk is very knowledgeable, and we trust his diagnosis.  He answers all of our questions, and has a thorough understanding of sport related injuries.
Good bedside manners, professional, on time, and very knowledgeable.

reviewDetails.comment: She’s extremely knowledgeable and up to date with facts related to her areas of specialty. She takes the time to answer questions and explain things in a clear and thorough manner. I never feel rushed or patronized. She’s an excellent doctor!
Dr. Feffer was kind and thorough, taking the time to explain some complicated things.  It was easy to make an appointment, and she has followed up on tests.  I highly recommend.

I recommend Dr Feffer because she is very professional, she knows to listen to the patient and knows how to explain and decide which plan is good for her patient. In addition, she is calm and therefore conveys tranquility.
She was knowledgeable, patient and a good listener. I felt well looked after in her care
She is an amazing doctor.
Very thorough and caring.

reviewDetails.comment: Dr. Shah is professional and thorough. He takes a conservative approach, which I appreciate.
Thoroughly satisfied with my visit!
Caring.  Sincere.  Always prompt and available
Very thorough, kind, and empathetic. My doctor is  a patient of his and I’ve seen how he was with my dad and I’m happy and lucky I found Dr Shah! Professional and smart.

Open Access Plus, OA Plus, ChoiceFund OA Plus with CareLink

reviewDetails.comment: Dr. Chiopelas listens and asks great questions. She is friendly, professional, and knowledgeable. I would highly recommend her to friends and family.
Professional, knowledgeable, expert in her field,friendly, easy to speak,listens, etc..  great doctor
She was a great listener and I didn’t feel rush. Her recommendation was also wonderful.
Dr. Chiopelas is a very patient and thorough doctor.  She took her time, listened to my concerns and did not rush the appointment.
She is a kind doctor and was helpful in explaining what was going on and what we were going to do about it
She's patient and kind and very knowledgeable. She helped me diagnose a big issue and is continuing to work with me to resolve any lingering issues.
Dr. Chiopelas is an amazing doctor, she listens, is engaged in your care and I highly recommend her.
Very cautious and patient- friendly physician…
